titleStmt.title: SII 8.193: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 193. (A.R. No. 596 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīIrāceṉtiracoḻatevaṟkku yāṇṭu 4vatu kaṉṉināyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu pañcamiyum nāyiṟṟukkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aniḻattu nāḷ vaṭakarai Irājarājavaḷanāṭṭu kalārkūṟṟattu brahmadeyam Aṉpil peruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom nammur Uṭaiyār tiru
vālantuṟaiUṭaiya nāyaṉār koyil Āticaṇṭecuvaratevakaṉmikaḷukku mahāvyavasthe paṇṇikkuṭutta paricāvatu Innāyaṉār tirunāmattukkāṇiyāy tiṟappil Iṟukkum nilam muṉṉāḷ Irupattoṉṟāvatu mutal Irupattāṟāvatu varaiyum Ūroṭe kūṭi
muṉpil Iṟukkum kaṭamai Iṟuttuppotukaiyil Ivvāṇṭukaḷil Ūril kaṭamaicelavaṟṟa viḻukkāṭṭukku meṟpaṭa tirunāmattukkāṇi Uṭalai Eṟa Eṭuttukkoḷkaiyil Ippaṭi Aṉṉiyāyam ceytom Eṉṟu Ivvūrkkup paḻiyāka kālañceyta tirumeṉi
paḻutaiyāṇṭār Iṉnāḷvaraiyum ciṅkātanattile paḷḷikoḷkaiyil Ikkāriyam śrīmāheśva rarum mutaliyārum nāṭṭavarum kūṭa Iruṉtu keṭṭu Innāyaṉār Innāḷkaḷil Iṟuttu Uṭaimai tāṉattār kaṇakkuppaṭiye kuṭuppatāka nāṅkaḷ niyoki
ttu Eḻutikkuṭuttu kālañceyta tirumeṉi paḻutaiyāṇṭārkku Innāyaṉār tirukkoyilile tirumeṉiyāka Eḻuṉtaruḷivittu Iṉnāyaṉāṟku Amutupaṭik kuṭalāka tirunāmattukāṇiyum Ūrkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyumāka kuṭutta Irunūṟṟe
ṇpatiṉkala varicai kārmaṟu va Iṉṉilam kālukkum nāṅkaḷ ḷiṭṭa nilamāvatu . maturāntakavatikku kiḻakku Irājentiracoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku mutaṟ kaṇṇāṟṟu mutaṟ catirattu caṅkaraṉ cantiracekarapaṭṭaṉ nilamāṉa teṅkañcey
ya Itaṟku kiḻpāṟkellai Āveṇi Aṅki cirākavapaṭṭaṉ nilattu meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai Irājentiravāykkālukku vaṭakkum meṟpāṟkellai Āveṇi Aṅki cirākavapaṭṭaṉ nilattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Uṭaiyār tiruvālaṉtu
ṟaiUṭaiya nāyaṉār tevatāṉattukkum tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattukkum teṟkkum Āicainta perunāṉkellai naṭuvupaṭṭa 2 + 1/20 Innilam Iraṇṭumāvum pavittira māṇikkavatikku kiḻakku Irājentiracoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku 19
Iraṇṭāñ catirattu Īśvaraṉ cirākavapaṭṭaṉ Eḻumāvil kiḻttalai Eṉṟu per kūvappaṭṭa nilam Itaṟku kiḻpārkkellai catirattukku meṟkkum teṉpāṟkellai tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam Amutukālppuṟattukku vaṭakku mipārṟkellai tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattu
kku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai kaṇṇāṟṟukku teṟkum Āka Icainta perunāṉkellai naṭuvupaṭṭa nilattu meṟkkaṭaiya 3 + 1/20 Iṉnilam muṉṟumāvum Āka Ip paṭiyāl vaṉta va Innilam kālum nālāvatu kārmutal Innāyinārkku tirunāmattukkāṇiyum
Ūrkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyumāka Iṟuttuk kuṭukkua kkaṭavomākavum . Innilam . Iṟukkumiṭattu Iṉnilattāl vaṉta kaṭamai kuṭimai viṉiyokam veṭṭi maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa Iṟaittevaikaḷāl vaṉtaṉa nāṅkaḷe Eṟaṭṭu Iṟuttu kuṭukkakkaṭavomākavum . Ip
paṭi candrādittavaṟ Ippaṭi Iṟuttukkuṭukkakkaṭavomāka Innāyanār tirukkoyili lum kalveṭṭikkuṭuttom peruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom . Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.193 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
